metadata.title: CVE-2022-43253 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Libde265 v1.0.8 was discovered to contain a heap-buffer-overflowvulnerability via put_unweighted_pred_16_fallback in fallback-motion.cc.This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) viaa crafted video file.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
